item.title: Nintendo Direct: Nintendo Switch 2 - 4.2.2025
item.description: Nintendo Direct: Nintendo Switch 2 – 4.2.2025 will air on Wednesday, April 2, 2025 at 6 a.m. PST, offering a closer look at Nintendo Switch 2.

item.title: SUPER NINTENDO WORLD Direct (Donkey Kong Country) 11.11.2024
item.description: Tune in on 11/11 at 2 p.m. PT for a SUPER NINTENDO WORLD Direct livestream! The stream will be roughly 10 minutes and showcase Donkey Kong Country of SUPER NINTENDO WORLD at Universal Studios Japan. No game information will be featured during the presentation.

item.title: Indie World Showcase + Nintendo Direct: Partner Showcase 8.27.2024
item.description: Watch an Indie World Showcase followed by a Nintendo Direct: Partner Showcase! Both presentations back-to-back, are roughly 40 minutes in total. Please note, there will be no mention of the Nintendo Switch successor during either of these presentations.

item.title: Nintendo Museum Direct 8.19.2024
item.description: Join us for a tour of the Nintendo Museum that’s scheduled to open during the fall of 2024 in Kyoto, Japan! The Nintendo Museum Direct is roughly 10 minutes. Please note that there will be no game announcements or mention of the Nintendo Switch successor during this presentation.

item.title: Nintendo Direct 6.18.2024
item.description: Watch the presentation for around 40 minutes focused on Nintendo Switch games coming in the second half of 2024. There will be no mention of the Nintendo Switch successor during this presentation.

item.title: Nintendo Direct: Partner Showcase 2.21.2024
item.description: A Nintendo Direct: Partner Showcase is here! Tune in for around 25 minutes of information focused on games coming to the Nintendo Switch system in the first half of 2024 from our publishing and development partners.
